introduction: This comprehensive marketing relationship plan is designed for wholesale distributors to build stronger partnerships with retailers, buying groups, and resellers. From new account acquisition to tier advancement, these programs optimize the entire retailer lifecycle to drive consistent ordering, assortment expansion, and mutual growth through the distribution channel.

company_summary.name: Wholesale & Distribution Company
company_summary.activities: B2B wholesale distribution including product sourcing, inventory management, logistics, and retailer support across diverse product categories
company_summary.target: Retail store owners, purchasing managers, buying group members, category managers, and multi-location retail operators who need reliable product supply
company_summary.customer_lifecycle_key_steps: Lead Generation > Credit Approval > Account Setup > First Order > Order Cycle Establishment > Assortment Expansion > Tier Advancement > Strategic Partnership > Advocacy

conclusion: Wholesale distributors that implement these comprehensive relationship marketing programs can expect improved retailer acquisition through systematic lead nurturing, more consistent ordering through proactive inventory management, expanded assortments through targeted cross-sell, and stronger partnerships through tier-based recognition and training support. The wholesale business rewards consistency, reliability, and mutual growth orientation - this plan delivers all three through systematic, automated engagement across the entire retailer lifecycle.
